name: Mind Dash
description:
Train your attention and mental calculation in this action-packed running game! Help different characters escape their pursuer by dodging, sliding, dashing, jumping over obstacles, and solving math problems along the way! Mind Dash combines a constant stream of math exercises with
reflex challenges to keep sharpen your wits while having fun!

Math exercises appear at key points to allow you to advance. The four arithmetic operations are split into 20 levels with problems becoming more complex as you reach higher levels. Play the game every day to improve your mental arithmetic skills!

The game is casual, brief, and ideal for busy people who want to keep their mind healthy. Dash with the speed of light and train your brain in this exciting and brain-twisting adventure!

Features:
- Solve challenging math problems under time pressure!
- Excellent reflex building running gameplay!
- Play as different character each day
- Gear up with upgradeable equipment
- Keep track of your high scores, accuracy and speed!
- Play daily for a chance to win bonus items

**Please note that while this app is free, it contains optional paid content. You can disable in-app purchases by adjusting your device's settings. **
